children.text: dhyāyantyatra tu nirmalātmaśivayoḥ sandhiśca śaivī purā
sandhyātaḥ śiva eva sādhakavarairdhyeyaḥ sadā nirmalaḥ
āyāmaiḥ śvanasya bhautikamalaṃ dehaṃ kalābhiḥ sudhīr
tatkarṇikākhye kriyāpīṭhe jñānamayaṃ viśuddhamanasā saṃsthāpya nādātmanā
liṅgaṃ tacca sudhāmayena payasā saṃsnāpya samyakpuno
śaive jyotiṣi yaḥ karoti puruṣo muktaḥ sa evākṣayaḥ
tatkandaṃ śatakoṭiyojanamitaṃ nālaṃ parārdhāntakaṃ granthiḥ koṭiparārdhapaścimasahasro 'bjaṃ ca tallakṣakam /
mūrtistasya ca koṭirīśvaramayī tasyārbudasyārbudāmbhojaṃ mantramayaṃ sadāśivavapustadvānameyaḥ śivaḥ //
nādākhyāya sadāśivāya mahate śāntāya tasmai namaḥ
this half-line appears to be unmetrical āryā
vāmaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ raudraṃ kalavikaraṇaṃ balavikaraṇaṃ kāntam /
this half-line appears to be unmetrical āryā
this half-line appears to be unmetrical āryā
śuddhāyāmalatejase ca mahate tasmai parasmai namaḥ
yasya taṃ praṇato 'smi niṣkalamavyayaṃ paramaṃ śivam
pātu vaḥ sakalāparaḥ sakalākalaḥ sakalaḥ śivaḥ
āvāhanaṃ svātmani citprakāśas tatra sthitiḥ sthāpanamīśvarasya /
bhogārthaṃ hi sadeśadhāmni vimalaṃ dīpaṃ śivajñānadam
yo hi vetti paraṃ śivaṃ śiva eva so 'stra na saṃśayaḥ
